spells.name: Chirurgeon's Healing Touch
spells.description: Heals one Light wound completely, or reduces one Medium wound to Light, or reduces one Heavy wound to Medium. Cannot heal wounds from deprivation.
spells.searchText: chirurgeon's healing touch heals one light wound completely, or reduces one medium wound to light, or reduces one heavy wound to medium. cannot heal wounds from deprivation. base 15 (heal light wound), +1 touch

spells.name: Bind Wound
spells.description: Instantly stops bleeding from any wound and prevents infection. Does not actually heal damage but stabilizes the patient.
spells.searchText: bind wound instantly stops bleeding from any wound and prevents infection. does not actually heal damage but stabilizes the patient. base 5 (stop bleeding), +1 touch

spells.name: Purification of the Festering Wounds
spells.description: Heals one Heavy wound completely, or heals all Light and Medium wounds. Removes infection and disease from wounds.
spells.searchText: purification of the festering wounds heals one heavy wound completely, or heals all light and medium wounds. removes infection and disease from wounds. base 20 (heal heavy wound), +1 touch

spells.name: Physician's Eye
spells.description: Instantly diagnoses all diseases, poisons, and injuries affecting the target. Provides precise medical knowledge.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (sense health), +1 Touch, +1 for detailed diagnosis
spells.searchText: physician's eye instantly diagnoses all diseases, poisons, and injuries affecting the target. provides precise medical knowledge. base 1 (sense health), +1 touch, +1 for detailed diagnosis

spells.name: Gentle Touch of the Purified Body
spells.description: Neutralizes minor poisons and removes minor diseases. Does not work against supernatural afflictions.
spells.searchText: gentle touch of the purified body neutralizes minor poisons and removes minor diseases. does not work against supernatural afflictions. base 10 (neutralize poison/disease), +1 touch

spells.name: Gift of Vigor
spells.description: Removes all Fatigue levels and grants immunity to natural fatigue for the duration. Does not protect against magical fatigue.
spells.searchText: gift of vigor removes all fatigue levels and grants immunity to natural fatigue for the duration. does not protect against magical fatigue. base 10 (remove fatigue), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Endurance of the Berserkers
spells.description: Grants +3 to Stamina for resisting fatigue, disease, and poison. Also provides +1 Soak against physical damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance body), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +2 for significant enhancement
spells.searchText: endurance of the berserkers grants +3 to stamina for resisting fatigue, disease, and poison. also provides +1 soak against physical damage. base 5 (enhance body), +0 personal, +2 sun, +2 for significant enhancement

spells.name: Blessing of Childlike Grace
spells.description: Makes the target appear healthy, young, and attractive. Adds +2 to all social interactions and removes signs of aging or disease.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (improve appearance), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +1 for significant change
spells.searchText: blessing of childlike grace makes the target appear healthy, young, and attractive. adds +2 to all social interactions and removes signs of aging or disease. base 5 (improve appearance), +1 touch, +3 moon, +1 for significant change

spells.name: Restoration of the Defiled Body
spells.description: Heals all wounds and removes all diseases and poisons. Restores lost limbs and organs, but cannot restore those lost to old age.
spells.searchText: restoration of the defiled body heals all wounds and removes all diseases and poisons. restores lost limbs and organs, but cannot restore those lost to old age. base 30 (major healing), +1 touch

spells.name: Invocation of Weariness
spells.description: Removes one Fatigue level from everyone in a group. Particularly useful for tired travelers or workers.
spells.searchText: invocation of weariness removes one fatigue level from everyone in a group. particularly useful for tired travelers or workers. base 10 (remove fatigue), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +2 group

spells.name: Disguise of the New Visage
spells.description: Changes your facial features, hair color, and general appearance to look like a different person. The transformation is convincing but not perfect under close scrutiny.
spells.searchText: disguise of the new visage changes your facial features, hair color, and general appearance to look like a different person. the transformation is convincing but not perfect under close scrutiny. base 3 (change appearance), +0 personal, +2 sun

spells.name: Shape of the Woodland Prowler
spells.description: Transforms the caster into a wolf, retaining human intelligence but gaining animal instincts and abilities. Clothing and equipment merge with the new form.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (major transformation), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite
spells.searchText: shape of the woodland prowler transforms the caster into a wolf, retaining human intelligence but gaining animal instincts and abilities. clothing and equipment merge with the new form. base 10 (major transformation), +0 personal, +2 sun, +1 animal requisite

spells.name: Growth of the Towering Form
spells.description: Increases the caster's size by 50%, granting +3 to Strength and +2 to damage, but -3 to Dexterity and Quickness due to clumsiness.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (change size), +0 Personal, +1 Diameter, +2 for significant change
spells.searchText: growth of the towering form increases the caster's size by 50%, granting +3 to strength and +2 to damage, but -3 to dexterity and quickness due to clumsiness. base 4 (change size), +0 personal, +1 diameter, +2 for significant change

spells.name: Cloak of Mist and Shadow
spells.description: Transforms the caster's body into mist, allowing passage through small openings and immunity to physical attacks, but vulnerability to wind.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (become insubstantial), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Auram requisite
spells.searchText: cloak of mist and shadow transforms the caster's body into mist, allowing passage through small openings and immunity to physical attacks, but vulnerability to wind. base 10 (become insubstantial), +0 personal, +1 concentration, +1 auram requisite

spells.name: Preternatural Growth and Shrinking
spells.description: Changes a person's size dramatically - shrink to the size of a child or grow to giant proportions. Strength and other attributes scale appropriately.
spells.searchText: preternatural growth and shrinking changes a person's size dramatically - shrink to the size of a child or grow to giant proportions. strength and other attributes scale appropriately. base 15 (extreme size change), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Claws of the Wild Beast
spells.description: Transforms the caster's hands into powerful claws that do +5 damage and can rend armor. The claws are clearly inhuman but incredibly sharp.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (grow natural weapons), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Animal requisite
spells.searchText: claws of the wild beast transforms the caster's hands into powerful claws that do +5 damage and can rend armor. the claws are clearly inhuman but incredibly sharp. base 5 (grow natural weapons), +0 personal, +1 concentration, +1 animal requisite

spells.name: Stance of the Patient Tree
spells.description: Transforms the caster into a tree, gaining immunity to most physical harm but becoming immobile. Can perceive surroundings and end the effect at will.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (become plant), +0 Personal, +2 for special duration, +1 Herbam requisite
spells.searchText: stance of the patient tree transforms the caster into a tree, gaining immunity to most physical harm but becoming immobile. can perceive surroundings and end the effect at will. base 10 (become plant), +0 personal, +2 for special duration, +1 herbam requisite

spells.name: Eyes of the Cat
spells.description: Transforms the caster's eyes to see perfectly in darkness and gain superior night vision. Eyes appear feline but function remains human.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (minor transformation), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite
spells.searchText: eyes of the cat transforms the caster's eyes to see perfectly in darkness and gain superior night vision. eyes appear feline but function remains human. base 3 (minor transformation), +0 personal, +2 sun, +1 animal requisite

spells.name: Curse of the Unruly Tongue
spells.description: Transforms the target's tongue so they can only speak in rhyme, or backwards, or in a foreign language. Extremely frustrating for spellcasters.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (change speech), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +1 for specific limitation
spells.searchText: curse of the unruly tongue transforms the target's tongue so they can only speak in rhyme, or backwards, or in a foreign language. extremely frustrating for spellcasters. base 4 (change speech), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +1 for specific limitation

spells.name: Fish Lungs and Fins
spells.description: Grants the ability to breathe water and swim with the speed and grace of a fish. Gills appear on the neck and hands become webbed.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (major body change), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Aquam requisite
spells.searchText: fish lungs and fins grants the ability to breathe water and swim with the speed and grace of a fish. gills appear on the neck and hands become webbed. base 5 (major body change), +0 personal, +2 sun, +1 aquam requisite

spells.name: Curse of the Twisted Form
spells.description: Hideously deforms the target, giving them a hunchback, twisted limbs, and disturbing features. Causes -6 to all social interactions and -3 to physical actions.
spells.searchText: curse of the twisted form hideously deforms the target, giving them a hunchback, twisted limbs, and disturbing features. causes -6 to all social interactions and -3 to physical actions. base 15 (major deformation), +2 voice, +3 moon

spells.name: Grip of the Choking Hand
spells.description: Prevents the target from breathing, causing them to slowly suffocate. Each round, the target takes fatigue damage.
spells.searchText: grip of the choking hand prevents the target from breathing, causing them to slowly suffocate. each round, the target takes fatigue damage. base 10 (interfere with breathing), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Curse of Circe
spells.description: Transforms a person into a pig, removing their human intelligence and speech but leaving their memories intact.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (major transformation), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite
spells.searchText: curse of circe transforms a person into a pig, removing their human intelligence and speech but leaving their memories intact. base 20 (major transformation), +2 voice, +2 sun, +1 animal requisite

spells.name: Cripple
spells.description: Permanently cripples one of the target's limbs, making it useless. The limb withers and becomes non-functional.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy body part), +2 Voice, +1 for permanent effect
spells.searchText: cripple permanently cripples one of the target's limbs, making it useless. the limb withers and becomes non-functional. base 10 (destroy body part), +2 voice, +1 for permanent effect

spells.name: Dust to Dust
spells.description: Ages the target by 10 years instantly. This aging is real and permanent, affecting both appearance and health.
spells.searchText: dust to dust ages the target by 10 years instantly. this aging is real and permanent, affecting both appearance and health. base 20 (accelerate aging), +2 voice

spells.name: Wound That Weeps
spells.description: Inflicts a Medium wound on the target. The wound appears as a deep gash that bleeds profusely.
spells.searchText: wound that weeps inflicts a medium wound on the target. the wound appears as a deep gash that bleeds profusely. base 10 (cause medium wound), +2 voice

spells.name: Curse of the Leprous Flesh
spells.description: Inflicts the target with a wasting disease that causes -2 to all physical actions and makes them appear diseased.
spells.searchText: curse of the leprous flesh inflicts the target with a wasting disease that causes -2 to all physical actions and makes them appear diseased. base 10 (cause disease), +2 voice, +3 moon

spells.name: The Phantom's Painful Touch
spells.description: Causes intense pain throughout the target's body. The target suffers -3 to all actions from the agony.
spells.searchText: the phantom's painful touch causes intense pain throughout the target's body. the target suffers -3 to all actions from the agony. base 5 (cause pain), +2 voice, +1 diameter

spells.name: Enfeeble the Stalwart Champion
spells.description: Reduces the target's Strength and Stamina by 3 points each for the duration.
spells.searchText: enfeeble the stalwart champion reduces the target's strength and stamina by 3 points each for the duration. base 10 (weaken characteristics), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Withering of the Limbs
spells.description: Causes all of the target's limbs to become weak and painful. The target suffers -5 to all physical actions.
spells.searchText: withering of the limbs causes all of the target's limbs to become weak and painful. the target suffers -5 to all physical actions. base 15 (major physical impairment), +2 voice, +3 moon

spells.name: Death's Touch
spells.description: Instantly kills a healthy human target by stopping their heart. Does not work on supernatural beings or those protected by magic.
spells.searchText: death's touch instantly kills a healthy human target by stopping their heart. does not work on supernatural beings or those protected by magic. base 35 (cause death), +1 touch

spells.name: Lifting the Dangling Puppet
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to control the gross motor movements of a human target, making them walk, gesture, or move as the caster desires. The victim retains consciousness and can speak, but their body obeys the caster's will completely.
spells.searchText: lifting the dangling puppet this spell allows the caster to control the gross motor movements of a human target, making them walk, gesture, or move as the caster desires. the victim retains consciousness and can speak, but their body obeys the caster's will completely. base 5 (control body movement), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Leap of Homecoming
spells.description: This powerful spell instantly transports a person to any location the caster can visualize clearly, such as their home or a familiar place. The journey is instantaneous and covers any distance, though it requires an Arcane Connection to the target.
spells.searchText: leap of homecoming this powerful spell instantly transports a person to any location the caster can visualize clearly, such as their home or a familiar place. the journey is instantaneous and covers any distance, though it requires an arcane connection to the target. base 15 (transport body), +4 arcane connection

spells.name: Spasms of the Uncontrolled Hand
spells.description: This spell causes uncontrollable spasms in the target's limbs, making fine motor control impossible. The victim cannot write, cast spells with somatic components, or perform any task requiring dexterity. Their hands shake and twitch constantly.
spells.searchText: spasms of the uncontrolled hand this spell causes uncontrollable spasms in the target's limbs, making fine motor control impossible. the victim cannot write, cast spells with somatic components, or perform any task requiring dexterity. their hands shake and twitch constantly. base 2 (minor body control), +2 voice, +1 diameter

spells.name: The Phantom's Painful Touch
spells.description: This spell manipulates the target's nervous system to create sensations of pain without actual injury. The victim experiences intense agony that can incapacitate them, but no physical damage occurs. The pain ends when concentration is broken.
spells.searchText: the phantom's painful touch this spell manipulates the target's nervous system to create sensations of pain without actual injury. the victim experiences intense agony that can incapacitate them, but no physical damage occurs. the pain ends when concentration is broken. base 3 (control sensations), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Rigid Bonds of Iron
spells.description: This spell causes the target's muscles to lock rigid, preventing all movement. The victim becomes as stiff as a statue, unable to move any part of their body. They remain conscious and can see and hear, but are completely paralyzed.
spells.searchText: rigid bonds of iron this spell causes the target's muscles to lock rigid, preventing all movement. the victim becomes as stiff as a statue, unable to move any part of their body. they remain conscious and can see and hear, but are completely paralyzed. base 10 (paralyze body), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Seven-League Stride
spells.description: This spell allows the target to take enormous strides, covering vast distances with each step. Each stride can cover up to a mile, allowing rapid travel across the countryside. The person must still walk, but each step propels them far forward.
spells.searchText: seven-league stride this spell allows the target to take enormous strides, covering vast distances with each step. each stride can cover up to a mile, allowing rapid travel across the countryside. the person must still walk, but each step propels them far forward. base 15 (enhance body capabilities), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Curse of the Sleeping Death
spells.description: This curse forces the target into a death-like sleep that lasts for a full year. They appear completely dead to casual examination, breathing so slowly as to be undetectable. The victim ages normally during this time but remains unconscious throughout.
spells.searchText: curse of the sleeping death this curse forces the target into a death-like sleep that lasts for a full year. they appear completely dead to casual examination, breathing so slowly as to be undetectable. the victim ages normally during this time but remains unconscious throughout. base 4 (control consciousness), +2 voice, +4 year

spells.name: Control the Heartbeat's Rhythm
spells.description: This spell gives the caster direct control over the target's heartbeat and circulation. The heart can be made to race, slow down, or even stop temporarily. Careful control can induce unconsciousness, while more aggressive use can cause death.
spells.searchText: control the heartbeat's rhythm this spell gives the caster direct control over the target's heartbeat and circulation. the heart can be made to race, slow down, or even stop temporarily. careful control can induce unconsciousness, while more aggressive use can cause death. base 15 (control vital functions), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Gift of the Bear's Fortitude
spells.description: This spell enhances the target's physical endurance and resilience, allowing them to function without fatigue for an entire day. They need no sleep, food, or rest, and can perform strenuous activities continuously without becoming tired.
spells.searchText: gift of the bear's fortitude this spell enhances the target's physical endurance and resilience, allowing them to function without fatigue for an entire day. they need no sleep, food, or rest, and can perform strenuous activities continuously without becoming tired. base 10 (enhance body functions), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Walk on the Gossamer Air
spells.description: This spell allows the target to walk on air as if it were solid ground. They can climb invisible stairs, walk across gaps, or stand suspended in midair. The effect requires concentration to maintain balance but feels natural once mastered.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (alter body interaction with environment), +1 Touch, +2 Sun
spells.searchText: walk on the gossamer air this spell allows the target to walk on air as if it were solid ground. they can climb invisible stairs, walk across gaps, or stand suspended in midair. the effect requires concentration to maintain balance but feels natural once mastered. base 5 (alter body interaction with environment), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Strings of the Unwilling Marionette
spells.description: This powerful spell allows the caster to control multiple people simultaneously, directing their movements like a puppeteer. Each target moves according to the caster's will, creating an eerie display of synchronized motion among the controlled victims.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (control multiple bodies), +3 Sight, +1 Concentration, +2 Group

spells.name: Posture of the Righteous Judge
spells.description: This spell forces the target to maintain perfect posture and bearing, making them appear dignified and authoritative. Their spine straightens, shoulders square, and every movement becomes graceful and controlled. This can enhance social interactions and presence.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (control posture and bearing), +2 Voice, +2 Sun
